page.title: 14FARMING IN EARLS COLNE
page.content: Earls Colne has a large amount of farmland in and around it.The farmland is mainly used to grow cereal crops, like oats,wheat and barley.The fields that are used as cereal crops are big but not massive.There is also quite a lot of land used as pasture but not a lot of livestock farming. Mr Bull is one of the few dairy farmers in Earls Colne.His herd consists of about fifty Friesian cattle.He also has a herd of about thirty Canborough Blue sows.He has about 120 acres of land,half is used for pasture land and the remainder for cereal crops.
